mapper.insert:
select quest_SEQ.nextval as id from dual
INSERT INTO question(id,title,description,creator,tag,gmtCreate,gmtModified) VALUES (#{id},#{title},#{description},#{creator},#{tag},#{gmtCreate},#{gmtModified})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM question q order by q.gmtcreate desc
mapper.update: update question q set q.viewcount=(q.viewcount+1) where q.id=#{id}
update question q set q.commentcount=(q.commentcount+1) where q.id=#{id}
update commentinfo c set c.commentcount=(c.commentcount+1) where c.id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM question where REGEXP_LIKE(TAG,#{tag},'i') and id !=#{id}
mapper.update: update question q set q.title =#{title},q.description=#{description},q.gmtCreate =#{gmtCreate},q.tag=#{tag} where q.id = #{id}
